title: In the middle of a game, constantly freezing up and going back in time
body:
I am currently in a ranked game as Rengar, and all was going well but I accidentally pressed a key or something, and now my game is constantly freezing up and rewinding in time. I can hear the right sounds but it keeps freezing up at every 10 seconds. Can someone please help? I'm leaving my team out to dry currently

EDIT: Finished the game, went into a custom, still happening. Ping and FPS are fine (never had this problem before), but it just freezes randomly, reverses back to a previous point in the game, and repeat.

replies.body:
Whenever it looks like your game is going back in time, it's a pretty good sign that you're connection is having some packet loss. We can verify this pretty easily, though! Grab your most recent game logs, and put those logs in our [Connection Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).

Hit me back up and let me know what it says!
